rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {SON4000, SON4010}

description: Sonographic scanning methods and standard protocols related to examinations of the musculoskeletal system and paediatric brain, hips and abdomen. Interpretational skills in respect to recognition of sonographic appearances of normal anatomy, anatomical variants, disease processes and the ability to modify standard sonographic approaches with regards to the clinical question and patient presentation. Particular attention will be paid to the principles of neonatal and paediatric patient care.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
